price: 55. Le dijeron: “¿Nos estás diciendo la verdad o eres de los que se burlan?”.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū aji'tanā bil-ḥaqi am anta mina al-lāʿibīna
